intro:
A fairytale where YOU save your Prince Charming!
Be the heroine and find your "happily ever after" with your chosen love interest in this visual novel!
description:
*This game is in Japanese. If you wish to play with English text, you will need the English Text Mode Add-On downloadable content (DLC). An English Text Mode Add-On bundle including the original game is also available.

TAISHO x ALICE ALL IN ONE includes all four episodes. Experience the complete adventure on the Nintendo Switch™ system!
Find yourself in a topsy-turvy fairytale world beyond the Looking Glass and encounter gender-flipped characters inspired by Cinderella, Red Riding Hood, and more! Join this colorful cast and unravel their twisted tales!
Enjoy the dynamic, stand-alone character paths, each set in an alternate universe in which the characters' relationships and roles vary.
Play as the heroine of each story, make choices to heal your love interest's heart, and navigate through the fairytale world to reach your happy ending!

Cast
CINDERELLA    VA: Daisuke Hirakawa
RED RIDING HOOD    VA: Tomoaki Maeno
KAGUYA    VA: Toshiki Masuda
GRETEL    VA: Takuya Eguchi
SNOW WHITE    VA: Shouta Aoi
WIZARD    VA: Wataru Hatano
ALICE    VA: Yoshitsugu Matsuoka
WOLF    VA: Natsuki Hanae
HUNTSMAN    VA: Tomohisa Hashizume
MOTHER    VA: Yu Shimamura
*Fully voiced (excluding the main character)

New Event CGs Added!
Events previously depicted with character sprites and backgrounds have received new CGs! Each character path has new art. Try to discover them all!

Includes the Drama CD Novelization!
The audio drama "Looking-Glass World's Biggest Masochist Tournament!", included as a bonus with the original console release, has been turned into a visual novel! Enjoy another fantastic tale featuring Cinderella, Gretel, Wizard, Alice, and Ryoushi!

*This title is only available in Japanese.
*"大正×対称アリス all in one" and "TAISHO x ALICE ALL IN ONE" are the same game.
